content: FHIR-I/SDC agreed to add a "design comments" extension that would allow embedding design notes at various places inside a questionnaire. However, this seems like something that could potentially be relevant for other infrastructure resources - e.g. value sets, structure definitions, perhaps even examples. Should we expand the scope to allow its use in other specific places? Widen it out to a context of "Any"?
not now, for procedural reasons. ask for comment at ballot... and see if anyone notices
Hard to ask for comment for an extension. Easy enough for us to change during the ballot process. I'll raise a separate tracker item so it's on our list.

The IG Publisher is reporting 

FHIR Implementation Guide Publisher (v3.4.0-14792, gen-code v3.4.0-13883)

When does the code-gen part get updated?
(so it has the latest class definitions in it)
Ok, Thanks. Was just starting to try and get the VhDir building again.
